channel.title: Make wildy go away in lumbridge
channel.description:
well i coded a allstar-scape v2 and i changed the home to lumbrige and now it stands that its wildy there and its all around.... but i want it go away...and just be wildy were wilderness is...like edge and varock... i dont want ppl to lose all stuff when they first loging into
please help me. thanks

item.title: Make wildy go away in lumbridge
item.dc:creator: @KaptainKoolAidz KaptainKoolAidz
item.description:
@KaptainKoolAidz wrote:

Each line is giving cords to make a box that doesnt allow attacking players.
Mess around with the code and try to figure it out.
Make a backup in case you mess it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Make wildy go away in lumbridge
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Open your client.java and search “public boolean nonWild() {”

You should see something like this

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 3089 && absX <= 3099 && absY >= 3487 && absY <= 3500) //G-Bank || (absX >= 3988 && absX <= 3006 && absY >= 3931 && absY <= 3966) //Ailigty Corse || (absX >= 3153 && absX <= 3156 && absY >= 3922 && absY <= 3925) //FFA || (absX >= 2561 && absX <= 2592 && absY >= 9730 && absY <= 9757) //Misc || (absX >= 2588 && absX <= 2620 && absY >= 4758 && absY <= 4787) //WC || (absX >= 3405 && absX <= 3452 && absY >= 3531 && absY <= 3579) //Slayer Tower || (absX >= 3280 && absX <= 3305 && absY >= 3157 && absY <= 3179) //Shops || (absX >= 3084 && absX <= 3126 && absY >= 3914 && absY <= 3952) //Dragon Pit || (absX >= 2847 && absX <= 2863 && absY >= 9628 && absY <= 9646) //King Black Dragon Lair || (absX >= 3506 && absX <= 3519 && absY >= 3192 && absY <= 3210) //Jad || (absX >= 2760 && absX <= 2794 && absY >= 3273 && absY <= 3291) //Fishing Platform || (absX >= 2582 && absX <= 2594 && absY >= 9484 && absY <= 9493) //Magic Guild Basement || (absX >= 2533 && absX <= 2621 && absY >= 3073 && absY <= 3098) //Yanille South || (absX >= 2533 && absX <= 2609 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3110) //Yanille West || (absX >= 2610 && absX <= 2610 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3109) //Yanille East1 || (absX >= 2611 && absX <= 2611 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3108) //Yanille East2 || (absX >= 2612 && absX <= 2612 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3107) //Yanille East3 || (absX >= 2613 && absX <= 2613 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3106) //Yanille East4 || (absX >= 2614 && absX <= 2614 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3105) //Yanille East5 || (absX >= 2615 && absX <= 2615 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3104) //Yanille East6 || (absX >= 2616 && absX <= 2616 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3103) //Yanille East7 || (absX >= 2617 && absX <= 2617 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3102) //Yanille East8 || (absX >= 2618 && absX <= 2618 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3101) //Yanille East9 || (absX >= 2619 && absX <= 2619 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3100) //Yanille East10 || (absX >= 2620 && absX <= 2620 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3099) //Yanille East11
Its just like making a box… i have given you plenty of info figure out the rest on ur own
